text: aqsm allah subhanah biawm alhisab waljza', waqsm bialnafs almuamanat altqyt alty tlwm sahibuha ealaa tarak altaeat wfiel almwbqat, 'ana alnaas ybethwn. ayznn hdha al'iinsan alkafir 'an lan naqdir ealaa jame eizamah baed tfrqha? bla snjmeha, qadirin ealaa 'an najeal asabeh 'aw anamlh -bed jmeha wtalyfha- khalqana swyana, kama kanat qabl almwt
